BikeSack

Class UsageInstrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • BikeSack.Instrument
      • BikeSack.TextualInstrument
        • BikeSack.UsageInstrument

  • public class UsageInstrument
extends BikeSack.TextualInstrument
    UsageInstrument builds on the TextualInstrument within the BikeSack motorcycle system. Primarily intended for Fuel Usage

    Use as a Usage Instrument

    - UsageInstrument.setUsageCurrent(Numerator, Denominator) to calculate the current difference between the last values and current vales.

    - Output.getLastNumerator(); to return last numerator value

    -if Output.setStartNumerator(); to set the starting value for the numerator

    Since:
    11/7/2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DevTeam2
